title: Chapter 3: The Search For Meaning [The Wise]
lyrics:
We choose to expand
We were given the gift of critical thought so that we could help to make the world a better place
A place that continues to search for meaning
We will not lose our humanity to anarchy and treason
They want to start a war
They want to enlist you in their fight, yet they have no compassion for it's impact on humanity

We do not come from a place of destruction, but rather, a place of emotion

A place where we lead with the heart and mind

Not a place of reactionary behaviour

The mind will prevail

Won't you prevail with us?
